title: Southland Auto Acres
description: Just out of college, Becky Pine wants a job, a girlfriend, and a manifesto. She wants a life -- her own real life. Southland Auto Acres, a car lot in Los Angeles, becomes her bootcamp for learning about love, relationships, and the real world. Originally published as Up: A Novel in 2002, the book was reissued under the title Southland Auto Acres in 2010 in anticipation of author Lisa Jones's next installment in the ongoing adventures of Becky Pine.
author: Lisa Jones
